casebody.data:
Steven H. BAMBERGER, Appellant, v. Robert C. WATSON, Commissioner of Patents, Appellee. No. 15284. United States Court of Appeals District of Columbia Circuit. Argued Dec. 11, 1959. Decided Dec. 17, 1959. Mr. W. Brown Morton, Jr., New York City, with whom Mr. Clarence M. Fisher, Washington, D. C., was on the brief, for appellant. Mr. David Kreider, Atty., United States Patent Office, with whom Mr. Clarence W. Moore, Sol., United States Patent Office, was on the brief, for ap-pellee.

Before Edgerton, Danaher, and Bas-tían, Circuit Judges.

*519PER CURIAM.

The plaintiff appeals from a judgment for the Commissioner of Patents in a suit under 35 U.S.C. § 145 to obtain a patent. We find no error.

Affirmed.
